dleplugin.mysqlinstall: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{prefix}_mail_senders` ( `id` INT UNSIGNED AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `surname` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `mail` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `phone` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, `current_time_stamp` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() );

dleplugin.notice:
Module creator ehmedp,
To use the module set globally mail_sender_info_save($name, $last_name, $tel, $email); you can use the function
$name : string => the name of the user who sent the mail $last_name : string => last name of the user who sent the mail $tel : string => tel of the user who sent the tel $email : string => The email of the user who sent the email
The function should be used if the mail sending process is successful.
Returns an error message if the function is not used correctly.
